item.description:
EVERYONE IS WELCOME TO ATTEND!


_____CARD MEMBER BENEFITS:_____
BRONZE: 10% off your total bill.
SILVER: 15% off your total bill

*FOR THIS EVENT SILVER AND GOLD MEMBERS WILL RECEIVE 15% OFF THE TOTAL BILL*

SUBSCRIBE and $AVE:
Learn more here: www.booze-club.com






You are not Mexican? well aren't we all Irish when St. Patty's Day comes around? so why not be Mexican for Cinco de Mayo? Join us at Blu where you will find that this hidden jewel has a spectacular view, relaxed atmosphere, fine European cuisine, and most importantly for us boozers "A FULL BAR" with some very exotic cocktails!!

Spend an evening with us having drinks like a SPICY EFFEN MOJITO, MARGARITA NEGRA, or even a BLU CHEESE MARTINI....sound intriguing enough? you know you want to try it!

To top it all off all of you boozers that come celebrate with us will get a very special invitation to return to Blu and get not 10%...not 25% but 50% off of your next visit!! I don't know about you but to me that sounds pretty damn GOOD!!!


***AND EVERYONE IS WELCOME TO ATTEND***



Just in case you decide you are not going to celebrate with us take a virtual tour of what you'll be missing here or even if you just want to check out the place beforehand also click here

Need driving directions? click here

If you are taking the T, Blu is a short walk from Boylston T (green line), Park Street (Red and Green Line), Chinatown (Orange Line) and even Downtown Crossing (Orange Line). Still not sure how to get there? click here to plan your trip on the T.

If you change your mind about coming last minute or just have questions please don't hesitate to call us, your assistant organizers:

Andrea 786-942-6097
Al 617-407-9659

Oh!! and don't forget to add us on FACEBOOK !!

SUBSCRIBE and $AVE:
Learn more here: www.booze-club.com
item.how_to_find_us: If I'm daring enough I might wear a Sombrero.....we'll see!!!
item.name: Celebrate 5 de MAYO with a MARGARITA NEGRA why don't cha?
